page.title: 08Roller Skating
page.content: My favourite{hobby}is{roller {skating.}Roller skates are boots with four small wheels attached to their undersides.I mostly go skating with my friends.We{whizz around Ilchester village because the pavement is very smooth and sometimes we go to the new estate in Alms House Lane. We do{stunts}down that lane trying to avoid the big potholes in the road. I like roller skating because I enjoy the feeling of speed with the wind blowing in my face. The{dangers}of skating occur when you get a stone caught in your wheel.That can make you go head over heels.You have to be prepared for scratches and bruises when you take up roller skating at first;but when you get the hang of it,it is great fun! PAULLA BARRASS.
